p: According to Table 4, a total of twenty-four active components were identified for Mentha cervina. Pulegone (58.54%) was identified as the main active compound. Following this, 1-Menthone (6.91%), Eucalyptol (6.76%), and L-Linalool (6.44%) were also detected in the Mentha cervina oil. In addition, Estragole, endoborneol, Bicyclo[3.1.1]heptane,6,6-dimethyl-2-methylene, Isopulegol, D-Limonene, and Alpha-Pinene were detected with the concentrations of 2.70, 2.31, 1.90, 1.46, 1.21, and 1.05%, respectively. The other components were found to be the minor components in the essential oil.
